summary: The diff updates the visible header brand text, footer copyright line, and the HTML <title> to "yor txt". It also introduces additional footer attribution/UTM-tracking behavior that was not part of the rename request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified footer attribution section including a caffeine.ai outbound link with UTM parameters and a computed appIdentifier based on window.location.hostname.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to renaming the app and updating the document title; adding/altering attribution links and tracking parameters is a new feature/behavior beyond renaming.
